description.zh_CN: 基于原生、可扩展的 Callout 增强插件，专注美化与高效操作，零数据改写
description.en_US: Native-extensible Callout enhancer for SiYuan — focused on beautification and efficient operations, with zero data modification

description.default: Fill text with API response by selecting text and clicking toolbar button
description.zh_CN: 通过选择文本并点击工具栏按钮，使用API响应自动填充文本

displayName.zh_CN: 思源智能美学体验套件

description.default: Make SiYuan easy to use, beautiful, and genuinely smart: honed in real workflows, fully customizable themes and artful palettes, with AI woven into product details. Daily interactions and visuals are almost entirely rebuilt—toolbars, menus, titles, folding logic; search, navigation, focus mode; paste, tags, bookmarks, references; history restore, the AI assistant, and more.
description.zh_CN: **友情提示**: 1.因为本插件有300多项配置,几乎覆盖所有层面的思源设定;难免会与已有的插件/主题的冲突(后续也不会兼容),因此在初次安装启动后会自动关闭第三方主题/js片段/插件,后续用户根据需要可以自行打开.2. 体验后卸载本插件不会造成数据损失,js片段不能用,插件没那么大的权限(插件是基于内存运行,不向用户文档写入数据,也不会持久化存在,卸载后既删除,若有疑问可找官方确认).3.我的最终目标是把定制化的权力交给用户(如有软件使用问题,可直接联系我(微信572378589),因平时较忙,论坛发帖/qq群吐槽/github上pull reuqest/水军抹黑一律不关注不处理),4.本插件可以免费使用半年以上..希望真正的让思源同时好用、好看、又聪明：在真实工作流里打磨交互体验，提供完全可定制的主题与艺术化配色，并把 AI 深度嵌入产品细节。几乎重写了思源的日常交互与视觉体验，从工具栏、菜单、标题,折叠逻辑到搜索、导航、聚焦模式,粘贴、标签、书签,引用,历史还原、AI 助手等等全面换代。

description.default: A plugin for SiYuan Note that implements task management features, developed to practice the Bullet Journal method. It supports document and block reminders, calendar view for scheduling, Pomodoro focus timer, and more.
description.zh_CN: 一款在思源笔记里实现任务笔记管理功能的插件，为了践行防弹笔记法而开发。支持文档和块提醒、日历视图查看行事历、番茄钟专注和数据统计、项目看板、四象限面板、习惯打卡等功能

description.default: 专业电子书阅读器，支持 PDF/EPUB/MOBI/TXT/在线小说等格式，智能标注笔记、书签管理、词典卡包、多书源搜索、多主题切换

description.en_US: Professional eBook reader supporting PDF/EPUB/MOBI/TXT/online novels and more formats with smart annotations, bookmarks, dictionary cards, book sources, and themes

description.default: Open Chinese Convert (OpenCC) is an opensource project for conversions between Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Japanese Kanji (Shinjitai). It supports character-level and phrase-level conversion, character variant conversion and regional idioms among Mainland China, Taiwan and Hong Kong. This is not translation tool between Mandarin and Cantonese, etc.
description.zh_CN: 开放中文转换 (Open Chinese Convert, OpenCC)是一个中文简繁转换开源项目，支持词汇级别的转换、异体字转换和地区习惯用词转换（中国大陆、台湾、香港、日本新字体）。不提供普通话与粤语的转换。
